categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Freighter Morgath 1 was a Container transport used for backup convoy services by Imperial defector Admiral Harkov's Victory-class Star Destroyer, the Protector. It was intercepted and shot down by Imperial Ace Maarek Stele along with Morgath 5, BFF-1 bulk freighter group Karflo, group SoroSuub, and CR90 corvette group Sundog.
